question: Match the content of List I with List II:
List I: 1. Polyembryony, 2. Perisperm, 3. False fruit, 4. Parthenocarpy
List II: p. Black pepper, q. Banana, r. Lemon, s. Apple
explanation: Polyembryony occurs in Citrus/Lemon (1-r), Perisperm is found in Black pepper (2-p), Apple is a False fruit (3-s), and Banana develops via Parthenocarpy (4-q).
